meta.title: Golden Retriever vs French Bulldog: Which is Right for You?
meta.description: Compare Golden Retrievers and French Bulldogs on energy, size, cost, and lifestyle fit.

intro: Deciding between a Golden Retriever and a Frenchie? One is an active family companion, the other is a chill apartment dweller. Let's break it down.

comparison_points.note: Frenchies are much better for low-activity households.
Goldens need space; Frenchies thrive in small spots.
Goldens are eager to please; Frenchies can be stubborn.

verdict.title: The Verdict
verdict.content: If you want an active partner for outdoor adventures, pick the Golden Retriever. If you want a low-maintenance cuddle buddy for your apartment, the French Bulldog is the winner.

cta.quiz_anchor: Still undecided? Take our Lifestyle Match Quiz.
